dataset.title: Parafuscosporella lignicola sp. nov. (Fuscosporellaceae), from a freshwater habitat in northern Thailand

abstract.para: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Lu, Xu, Rong-Ju, Luo, Zong-Long, Zhao, Qi, Cheewangkoon, Ratchadawan (2023): Parafuscosporella lignicola sp. nov. (Fuscosporellaceae), from a freshwater habitat in northern Thailand. Phytotaxa 597 (2): 141-152, DOI: 10.11646/phytotaxa.597.2.4, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/phytotaxa.597.2.4

intellectualRights.para: To the extent possible under law, the publisher has waived all rights to these data and has dedicated them to the Public Domain (CC0 1.0). Users may copy, modify, distribute and use the work, including for commercial purposes, without restriction.

gbif.citation: Li L, Xu R, Luo Z, Zhao Q, Cheewangkoon R, plazi (2023). Parafuscosporella lignicola sp. nov. (Fuscosporellaceae), from a freshwater habitat in northern Thailand. Plazi.org taxonomic treatments database. Checklist dataset https://doi.org/10.15468/z7njpb accessed via GBIF.org on 2023-08-28.

bibliography.citation: Li, Lu, Xu, Rong-Ju, Luo, Zong-Long, Zhao, Qi, Cheewangkoon, Ratchadawan (2023): Parafuscosporella lignicola sp. nov.
